name: X-Treme Express
summary: X-Treme Express is the sequel to the Japanese-only title Tetsu 1: Densha de Battle!. Players race against five other trains in high-speed point-to-point races, being careful not to derail by taking curves too quickly and switching between tracks to knock opponents off the track. The game features ten different courses and eighty different trains.

name: Xtreme Wheels
summary:
Get ready for the wildest two-wheel ride on the App Store! Xtreme Wheels takes you on an amazing, hazard filled trip over explosives, ladders, barrels, twisted ramps, huge gaps, and precarious cargo containers all on a powerful trial bike.
Balance and speed are what you will need to complete the increasingly difficult courses without breaking every bone in your riders body! Explosive barrels line the course and can be your friend or lethal foe by boosting your speed and height or bringing a very quick end to your riding career. Whether you survive as a champion or fall to the ground as a loser, Xtreme Wheels promises to be a spectacle both in gameplay and visuals, making it an eye-popping experience unlike any other on a handheld device.

name: X-Tactics
summary: X-Tactics is an episodic Turn Based RPG updated weekly, that is also a location-based game that uses player location and local weather to affect the tactical conditions of missions, which combines turn-based tactical gameplay with an original fighting game inspired combo/command skill system, and mechanics to create a new style of gameplay. In it you control a rag-tag team of secret agents who protect the World and the Truth.

name: Xtreme Sports
summary:
In the Game Boy Color version of Xtreme Sports, players compete against more than 200 computer-controlled opponents on 25 different tracks in sports such as street luge, skateboarding, inline skating, surfing and skyboarding. At the start of the game, players choose between characters Guppi and Fin and set off on a trip sponsored by the Xtreme Cola Company, which has invited all extreme sports athletes to Xtreme Sports Island to compete in a tournament. Among the people players encounter are the members of the Bone-Heads gang, who are the antagonists. The player's objective is to unravel the mystery behind them and win the tournament at the same time.

There are two modes available: Practice and Xtreme Island Adventure. In the former, players can participate in 15 different challenges with 3 difficulty settings. In the latter, players move around the island participating in events and exploring the surroundings. Some of the people players meet will give the player clues to solving the mystery of the Bone-Heads while others will issue challenges to compete in various sports. Players collect medals as the player win events. Players must win a certain number of easier challenges before the referees will allow the player into the tougher ones. Along the way players can also find Twitchy Shakes, which are special drinks that will increase the player's abilities depending on the next event the player enters. Players may be able to attain higher speeds or even become invincible.

name: Xtrike
summary: Xtrike is a shoot'em up game integrated with action real-time strategies. Players need to produce battle units and also control heroes to destroy incoming enemies.

name: X-Tension
summary:
X-Tension is the eagerly awaited expansion pack to X: Beyond the Frontier. The expansion is not limited by a linear plot line but makes use of new ways to expand your empire. You can now take part in missions that are offered to you throughout the game.

Continue your quest to explore the universe, trade in over 90 sectors, with over 50 goods, upgrade your ship with dozens of wares available to you by 5 unique alien races and protect yourself from the hostile Xenon.

name: Xterium: War of Alliances
summary: Xterium is a space strategy game in real time. Research technologies with each giving various advantages. Start a computer technology to run a mission fleet. Weapons technology helps you to survive. Recruit a geologist to support the development of resources. You can also hire admiral, so you wouldn't lose control in battles. Expand the empire by constructing Metal Mine, Robot Factory, Solar Power plant, Shipyard, Research Lab, Deuterium Power Plant, and so on. You can have a clear review whether your empire is being spied. Increase your units to rise in the Hall of Fame. Collect achievements and create an alliance.

name: Xtreme Club Racing
summary: Get behind the wheel in one of eShop's most frantic extreme driving games. Travel back in time with a flashback to the ARCADES with pure ARCADE style retro-playability.

name: Xtract
summary:
Embark on a treasure hunt in the Xtract shooter full of puzzles, PvE as well as PvP missions, treasure hunting, and much more!

The lost civilization has left rare artifacts and untold treasures on a mysterious island. Find them, outsmart your rivals and get all the loot!

Assemble your team, fight enemies and other adventurers! Get new weapons and supplies, customize equipment and use all the capabilities of modern technology and the power of mystical artifacts!

name: Xtris
summary: XTRIS is an arcade dexterity game for the Playdate console. The goal is to catch as many Xs as possible within 60 seconds by moving around tetronimo-inspired game boards. The game currently features 3 levels, complete with stat tracking, leaderboards, achievements, and unlockable skins.

name: Xtrhme
summary:
Feel the rhythm with "ME". Check out the Brand New Rhythm Game "Xtrhme".

Experience 20+ songs from various artists while adapting to a transforming play-field!
Notes fall from the top in "FallinK" mode, and span out from the center of the screen in "CentorE" mode!

name: Xtreme Sports Bundle 2 in 1
summary: This bundle contains: - ATV Drift & Tricks - Grand Mountain Adventure: Ski and Snowboard Wonderlands

name: Xtreme Golf 2003
summary: A golf game playable on Itchio!

name: Xtreme Typing
summary: This fast-moving, action game will keep your fingers on the keyboard as you move your motorcycle across the desert and through the heart of the city. Type accurately and faster than your target words per minute and watch a motorcycle stunt fest!

name: xTypeVersus
summary: xTypeVersus is a typing game where players will face their aptitude to type fast, accurate but also to adapt to the situation. Play solo or versus other players.

name: X-Type
summary: X-Type is a crazy space Shoot'em'Up with endless boss battles. Each time you defeat a boss, the next one will come back even bigger and meaner.

name: Xtreme League
summary: Go snowboarding whenever you like, regardless of the weather outside the window! Learn new tracks, get points and renew your board! Xtreme League is waiting for you!

name: Xtom 3d
summary: Xtom 3D is a 3D arcade shooter. You can fly any of three available aircraft: a jet-like airplane, a colourful UFO and a flying robot. Each aircraft has unique weapons and magical effects. You fly over various themes of 3D terrain (deserts, valleys, caverns, technological structures) in third person and have to shoot down enemy aircraft. Each level is concluded with a big level boss. On your way there you will have to collect power-ups and avoid enemy fire. As long as you are firing weapons you build up your mana bar, when full you can use a powerful magic blast that does a lot of damage.

name: Xtractor Defender
summary: Xtractor Defender one of the toughest Tower RTS you will have ever played. Are You Up For the Challenge Team Leader ?

name: Xtreme Sports
summary: The Xtreme Sports showdown has begun! Play as Guppi or her boyfriend Fin as they visit Xtreme Island and aim to become Xtreme Sports Champion by mastering five events - skateboarding, street luge, in-line skating,

name: XThrust
summary:
Fly your rocket drone in round based multiplayer races and single player challenges.
Beat the best times, gain XP with spectacular flying and win races to earn coins.
Race through a growing range of maps and upgrade your rocket drone.

name: Xtraction Royale
summary: Xtraction Royale is an upcoming Battle Royale virtual reality experience developed by RevolutionVR using the award winning Unreal Engine 4, a game that will place you against other players in a fight to escape an island, winners will be rewarded with an ingame currency that can be exchanged to RVR, a cryptocurrency designed for VR and Gaming. Either alone or in squad, plan your way out by any means necessary!

name: Xtreme Wheels
summary: Are you bad enough to handle the best? The world's top BMX racers are ready to take you on, and you have no choice but to answer the call. You'll start at the bottom of the rankings, trying to work your way up the ladder by mastering 20 grueling courses and nailing difficult tricks. The object is to earn as many licenses as possible, which will earn you the right to compete in higher classes. Needless to say, the competition will get smarter and quicker as you advance through the ranks, so you'll need to bring your sharpest skills to the table. There are four different classes to stretch your abilities, and you can actually earn new riders by notching a few victories. XTREME WHEELS is packed with varied hills, jumps, and terrain, so you might want to start off in Exclusive Training mode to get a grip on the handling and realistic physics that the game engine delivers. If you want to be the ultimate Xtreme racer, you'd better get cracking.

name: Xtreme Sports
summary:
Sega Extreme Sports, known simply as Xtreme Sports for the North American release and as Pepsi Max Extreme Sports for the Windows version, is a sports game developed by Norwegian video game development company Innerloop Studios and published by French holding company Infogrames for the Dreamcast and Microsoft Windows, and Sega for the European Dreamcast version.

The Dreamcast version features a soundtrack licensed from the electronic music label Ninja Tunes and includes tracks from artists such as Amon Tobin, Coldcut, and DJ Food.

name: X-Team
summary: X-TEAM is a role-playing strategy with a non-linear narrative. You must form your squad and fight aliens around the world. Use dozens of weapons, paranormal abilities of heroes and your charisma to destroy the enemy!

name: X-Town 3D game
summary: 3-dimensional shooting game.

name: Xtal
summary: XTAL is a hybrid TPS/Hack 'n' Slash set in an arcane world. Fight off enemies corrupted by an unknown power and explore evocative and mysterious landscapes. Upgrade your arsenal and make use of a forgotten technology to discover the fate of a kingdom in ruin.

name: Xtodie
summary: Xtodie is a game based on Norse mythology.

name: Xtreme Garage: Drifter
summary: Xtreme Garage: Drifter is a 3D car racing game for drift and motorsport enthusiasts.

name: Xtreme Rally
summary: Xtreme Rally, known as Off Beat Racer! in Japan, is a 3D off-road racing game developed and released by SNK for for Hyper Neo Geo 64 hardware on May 13, 1998 Just like Roads Edge, each track features loops on both endpoints, causing a two-way road that can lead to head-on collisions. Up to four cabinets can be linked up for multiplayer support.

name: Xtreme Aces Racing
summary: Xtreme Aces Racing brings a new exciting racing genre with combat mechanics and jets! Race through stunning locations around the globe in story mode or challenge a friend in local multiplayer mode. Defeat your enemies using attack and defense powerups and be the first to see the checkered flag.

name: X-treme Quads
summary:
Start your engines!

X-Treme Quads features wild quad bike racing over even wilder terrain.

So hold on tight!

There are miles and miles of unrelenting track to cover before you can be crowned the champion, and the only guarantee is that the ride is going to be extreme!

- 12 Xtreme quad bikes to choose from
- 9 Xtreme racing tracks
- Xtreme terrain and jumps to test you
- Xtreme AI competitors to try and beat

name: Xtreme Air Racing
summary: NASCAR style racing but in an airplane!

name: Xtreme Speed
summary: Xtreme Speed is a Racing game, developed and published by Phoenix Games, which was released in Europe in 2004.

name: Xtreme Paddleball
summary: The most explosive game of paddleball you've ever played, XTREME PADDLEBALL will challenge even diehard fans of the franchise. No matter what you've heard, there's nothing but you and your trusty paddle in XTREME PADDLEBALL! So get back in the saddle and put your balls on your paddles!

name: XType Plus
summary: An endless boss battle bullet hell shooter. Also features a more frantic "plus" mode as well as online leaderboards with included replay sharing.
